jobs.name: :teacher: Professor
jobs.info: Now it's your turn to feed knowledge and hammer facts into worthless brains attending your prestigious academy

jobs.name: :technologist: Web Developer
jobs.info: Trust me, you don't want to end up having PTSD with thousands of errors and bugs appearing in your work

jobs.name: :office_worker: Entreprenuer
jobs.info: Drive the business well or decide to kill yourself over debt and losses

jobs.name: :scientist: CERN Researcher
jobs.info: No one knows how long will you live exposed to all those harmful radiation and chemicals

jobs.name: :firefighter: Firefighter
jobs.info: Every arsonist's nightmare job; instead of setting things on fire, you'll be extinguishing them. Sad.

jobs.name: :pilot: Commercial Pilot
jobs.info: You've watched all those documentaries about crashes. Now it's time to mark your own.

jobs.name: :astronaut: Astronaut
jobs.info: It's all fun and games till some tiny asteroids puncture your suit and oxygen tank

jobs.name: :health_worker: Doctor
jobs.info: Either you leave the hospital alive or your patient does
